document_data.name: Choking Claw
document_data.mainbody: '''''Choking claw''''' was an [[evocation]] [[spell]] used by [[dragon]]s.{{Cite dragon/232/Wyrms of the North: Balagos|87}}
document_data.Effects: This spell created a black taloned claw of shimmering magical energy. The claw appeared in the air near a chosen target, attempting to rake them. The claw was unable to grab, strangle, or grapple. If the caster wished for the claw to attack a new target it would wink out of existence and reappear next to the new target. A ''choking claw'' would vanish if the caster began casting another spell.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] components to cast.
